description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 	222633HH  dated 02/06/2023 for: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of rear addition). Amendment seeks alterations from hip roof to gable roof for part of approved single storey rear extension
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings:
22/513/9/01 (Single Storey Extension Proposed Ground & First Floor Plan, Rev A),
22/513/9/02 (Single Storey Extension Proposed Second Floor & Roof Plans, Rev A),
22/513/P/03 (Single Storey Extension Proposed South & East Elevation, Rev A)
22/513/P/04 (Single Storey Extension Proposed North Elevation, Rev A)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
